extension.summary: Listen to Basque language radio stations and podcasts
extension.description: Listen to nearly 30 radio stations that broadcast, completely or at least partially, in Basque language. From version 2.0.0 onwards you can listen to a lot of podcasts in Basque language too.
Plugin honi esker programazio osoa, edo gutxienez zati bat, euskaraz emititzen duten ia 30 irrati entzun ditzakezu zuzenean. 2.0.0 bertsiotik aurrera euskarazko podcast mordo bat ere entzun dezakezu.
extension.news: v2.0.0 (2016-12-24) + Now you can listen to a lot of podcasts in Basque language
